original_text: Then we will give our daughters to you, and we will take your daughters to ourselves, and we will dwell with you and become one people.
korean_text: 우리 딸을 너희에게 주며 너희 딸을 우리가 데려오며 너희와 함께 거주하여 한 민족이 되려니와

sentences.original_text: Then we will give our daughters to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리는 우리의 딸들을 너희에게 주겠고

sentences.original_text: and we will take your daughters to ourselves
and we will dwell with you
